attr.title: Holocure
attr.desc: Play as your favorite Vtubers from Hololive! Fight, explore, and clear your way through armies of fans and save them from their mind-control in this unofficial free fan-game.
attr.inst: Download the specified steam depot: `download_depot 2420510 2420511 2583401865065080709` and copy all the data to `ports/holocure/gamedata`.
